comment.author: 61512875@N03
comment._content: Al Presidente Lincoln le  acusaron de tener 2 caras en política  y el dijo : ¿Ustedes creen que si yo tuviera dos caras usaría ésta?.

comment.author: 50686800@N03
comment._content: This is my half-third cousin. We both shared the same Mordecai Lincoln. It was his 3rd great grandfather and my 5th great grandfather.
